JSON.parse(localStorage["refState"]).refURL : ""; // console.log(ref_url); export default class Benefits extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); AOS.init(); } componentWillReceiveProps() { AOS.refresh(); } render() { return (

Citizenship Benefits of joining Club

There are many intelligent reasons to join. Whether you actively attend our community meetings or simply relish the intellectual stimulation that membership promotes, you'll find the benefits of Sapio membership to be numerous indeed.

Our members only live, work, learn and earn leisure club house offers an elegant, contemporary and welcoming ambience where members mix and meet to exchange ideas, build relationships and entertain their guests. (Click here to see pictures and activities of club house)

The quality and seniority of Members is the # 1 consideration of any club. Membership is by invitation only and, with the active support of the Sapio Clubs HSI (High Social Importance) directors and members will build an outstanding membership roster of high calibre individuals.

The majority of our Members are Chairmen, Founders, CEOs, Managing Directors, Directors and Partners in their organizations. Others are Senior Executives.

Other benefits of the Club include:

MEMBERS REWARD

Access to over 250 international discounted loyalty service and business partners. (Click to view)

CLUB HOUSE

Access to our all equipped members only club house;

Gym : Aerobics, Dance, Yoga (classes) | Pool | Spa

Cafe : A choice of and private dining areas and club Lounge

Intelligent Games room Work stations (meeting rooms, training & conference rooms) Mini Resort &, Gardens and Courtyard & Our affordable luxury signature Stay in aparthotel to entertain and host private groups. (Click to view)

GROW CLIENTELE & NETWORK

* Invitation to community events, providing exceptional networking, valuable information and enjoyable experiences.

* Networking arrangements and special introductions by your Membership Manager

* Excellent club location, privacy & security

* Ultimate entertaining venue with five star amenities

* Outstanding and discounted members only food and services

* Business Ads and Listings

* Direct Access to Government & International Investors

* Opportunities to fund Entrepreneurs, business ideas and research

* Gain Leadership Skills (Preparation for Office), not too young to start making impacts!

* Contribute your quota to national development

Our goal is to provide our Members with the finest private club experience and to offer access to a number of high quality benefits, products and services. 

Over time, the Club will team-up with leading firms to help Members get the most out of their Club experience. With each of our services, we seek to help members and their companies by creating opportunities to grow their business at home and abroad and providing, where possible, strategic marketing support, connections and a range of exclusive benefits as part of our Members benefits.

Become a
Member!

Join the community of Intellectuals.

Join Now
